test1.userText: I want to explore Hong Kong temples and museums for a cultural half-day experience, preferably including traditional architecture and historical artifacts

test2.userText: Looking for outdoor activities and nature spots in Hong Kong, maybe hiking and scenic views for a full day adventure

test3.userText: Family trip with kids to Hong Kong, need fun attractions, theme parks, and family-friendly restaurants for 2 days

test4.userText: Budget backpacker trip to Hong Kong, looking for cheap eats, free attractions, and street markets for 3 days under 500 HKD

test5.userText: Luxury shopping and fine dining experience in Hong Kong, high-end malls, michelin restaurants for 1 day unlimited budget
